title: Interview Preparation
description: Master the full interview process from first HR screening to the final CTO meeting. Simulate real conversations and get personalized feedback.

submodules.title: HR Interview
submodules.description: Practice general questions, motivations, and soft skills with an HR interviewer.
tips: Structure your answers clearly — beginning, middle, end.
Use real examples from your experience, even simple ones.
Try the STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result.

submodules.title: Technical Interview
submodules.description: Prepare to explain technical decisions, architecture, and code logic clearly.
tips: Focus on clarity, not just correctness.
Avoid buzzwords unless you can explain them simply.
Imagine you're explaining to a junior developer or product manager.

submodules.title: Final Interview
submodules.description: Get ready to speak with leadership about your goals, values, and long-term fit.
tips: Be honest but optimistic — this is about who you are, not a test.
Connect your goals to what the company is doing.
Ask questions too — it shows you're not just passively hoping to get hired.
